title.en: Biographies of the Marquis of Weiqi and the Marquis of Wu'an
title.raw: 《魏其武安侯列傳》 Biographies of the Marquis of Weiqi and the Marquis of Wu'an

sentences.zh: 魏其侯竇嬰者，孝文后從兄子也。

translations.literal: Wei qi hou Dou Ying person, Xiao Wen hou cong xiong zi ye.
translations.idiomatic: Weiqi marquis Dou Ying was Empress Wen's nephew.

sentences.zh: 父世觀津人。

translations.literal: Fu shi Guan jin ren.
translations.idiomatic: Father generation Guanjin people.

sentences.zh: 喜賓客。

translations.literal: Xi bin ke.
translations.idiomatic: Liked guests.

sentences.zh: 孝文時，嬰為吳相，病免。

translations.literal: Xiao Wen shi, Ying wei Wu xiang, bing mian.
translations.idiomatic: During Emperor Wen time, Ying served as Wu chancellor, fell ill and resigned.

sentences.zh: 孝景初即位，為詹事。

translations.literal: Xiao Jing chu ji wei, wei Zhan shi.
translations.idiomatic: Emperor Jing initially ascended, served as Director of Ceremonies.

sentences.zh: 梁孝王者，孝景弟也，其母竇太后愛之。

translations.literal: Liang Xiao wang person, Xiao Jing di ye, qi mu Dou tai hou ai zhi.
translations.idiomatic: Liang filial king was Emperor Jing's younger brother, his mother Empress Dou loved him.

sentences.zh: 梁孝王朝，因昆弟燕飲。

translations.literal: Liang Xiao wang chao, yin kun di Yan yin.
translations.idiomatic: Liang filial king attended court, because brothers banquet drinking.

sentences.zh: 是時上未立太子，酒酣，從容言曰：「千秋之後傳梁王。」

translations.literal: Shi shi shang wei li tai zi, jiu han, cong rong yan yue: "Qian qiu zhi hou chuan Liang wang."
translations.idiomatic: At this time emperor not yet established crown prince, wine drunk, leisurely said: "After thousand autumns pass to Liang king."

sentences.zh: 太后驩。

translations.literal: Tai hou huan.
translations.idiomatic: Empress dowager happy.

sentences.zh: 竇嬰引卮酒進上，曰：「天下者，高祖天下，父子相傳，此漢之約也，上何以得擅傳梁王！」

translations.literal: Dou Ying yin zhi jiu jin shang, yue: "Tian xia zhe, Gao zu tian xia, fu zi xiang chuan, ci Han zhi yue ye, shang he yi de shan chuan Liang wang!"
translations.idiomatic: Dou Ying pulled goblet wine advanced emperor, said: "The realm is Gaozu's realm, father son mutually transmit, this Han's compact, emperor how can arbitrarily pass to Liang king!"

sentences.zh: 太后由此憎竇嬰。

translations.literal: Tai hou you ci zeng Dou Ying.
translations.idiomatic: Empress dowager from this hated Dou Ying.

sentences.zh: 竇嬰亦薄其官，因病免。

translations.literal: Dou Ying yi bo qi guan, yin bing mian.
translations.idiomatic: Dou Ying also disdained his office, because illness resigned.

sentences.zh: 太后除竇嬰門籍，不得入朝請。

translations.literal: Tai hou chu Dou Ying men ji, bu de ru chao qing.
translations.idiomatic: Empress dowager removed Dou Ying's gate register, could not enter court audience.

sentences.zh: 孝景三年，吳楚反，上察宗室諸竇毋如竇嬰賢，乃召嬰。

translations.literal: Xiao Jing san nian, Wu Chu fan, shang cha zong shi zhu Dou wu ru Dou Ying xian, nai zhao Ying.
translations.idiomatic: Emperor Jing third year, Wu Chu rebelled, emperor examined imperial clan various Dou none like Dou Ying worthy, then summoned Ying.

sentences.zh: 嬰入見，固辭謝病不足任。

translations.literal: Ying ru jian, gu ci xie bing bu zu ren.
translations.idiomatic: Ying entered audience, firmly declined apologized illness insufficient for duty.

sentences.zh: 太后亦慚。

translations.literal: Tai hou yi can.
translations.idiomatic: Empress dowager also ashamed.

sentences.zh: 於是上曰：「天下方有急，王孫寧可以讓邪？」

translations.literal: Yu shi shang yue: "Tian xia fang you ji, wang sun ning ke yi rang xie?"
translations.idiomatic: Thereupon emperor said: "Realm currently has emergency, wang grandson how can decline?"

sentences.zh: 乃拜嬰為大將軍，賜金千斤。

translations.literal: Nai bai Ying wei da jiang jun, ci jin qian jin.
translations.idiomatic: Then appointed Ying as grand general, granted gold thousand jin.

sentences.zh: 嬰乃言袁盎、欒布諸名將賢士在家者進之。

translations.literal: Ying nai yan Yuan Ang, Luan Bu zhu ming jiang xian shi zai jia zhe jin zhi.
translations.idiomatic: Ying then spoke Yuan Ang, Luan Bu various famous generals worthy scholars in home advanced them.

sentences.zh: 所賜金，陳之廊廡下，軍吏過，輒令財取為用，金無入家者。

translations.literal: Suo ci jin, chen zhi lang wu xia, jun li guo, zhe ling cai qu wei yong, jin wu ru jia zhe.
translations.idiomatic: Granted gold, displayed under corridor eaves, military officials passed, always made them take wealth for use, gold none entered home.

sentences.zh: 竇嬰守滎陽，監齊趙兵。

translations.literal: Dou Ying shou Xing yang, jian Qi Zhao bing.
translations.idiomatic: Dou Ying defended Xingyang, oversaw Qi Zhao troops.

sentences.zh: 七國兵已盡破，封嬰為魏其侯。

translations.literal: Qi guo bing yi jin po, feng Ying wei Wei qi hou.
translations.idiomatic: Seven kingdoms troops already all broken, enfeoffed Ying as Weiqi marquis.

sentences.zh: 諸游士賓客爭歸魏其侯。

translations.literal: Zhu you shi bin ke zheng gui Wei qi hou.
translations.idiomatic: Various wandering scholars guests contended to attach Weiqi marquis.

sentences.zh: 孝景時每朝議大事，條侯、魏其侯，諸列侯莫敢與亢禮。

translations.literal: Xiao Jing shi mei chao yi da shi, Tiao hou, Wei qi hou, zhu lie hou mo gan yu kang li.
translations.idiomatic: During Emperor Jing time each court discussed great matters, Tiaohou, Weiqi marquis, various marquises none dared with oppose etiquette.

sentences.zh: 孝景四年，立栗太子，使魏其侯為太子傅。

translations.literal: Xiao Jing si nian, li Li tai zi, shi Wei qi hou wei tai zi fu.
translations.idiomatic: Emperor Jing fourth year, established Li crown prince, made Weiqi marquis crown prince tutor.

sentences.zh: 孝景七年，栗太子廢，魏其數爭不能得。

translations.literal: Xiao Jing qi nian, Li tai zi fei, Wei qi shu zheng bu neng de.
translations.idiomatic: Emperor Jing seventh year, Li crown prince deposed, Weiqi repeatedly contended could not obtain.

sentences.zh: 魏其謝病，屏居藍田南山之下數月，諸賓客辯士說之，莫能來。

translations.literal: Wei qi xie bing, ping ju Lan tian nan shan zhi xia shu yue, zhu bin ke bian shi shuo zhi, mo neng lai.
translations.idiomatic: Weiqi apologized illness, secluded resided Lantian south mountain below several months, various guests debaters persuaded him, none could come.

sentences.zh: 梁人高遂乃說魏其曰：「能富貴將軍者，上也；

translations.literal: Liang ren Gao Sui nai shuo Wei qi yue: "Neng fu gui jiang jun zhe, shang ye;
translations.idiomatic: Liang person Gao Sui then persuaded Weiqi: "Able make rich noble general, emperor;

sentences.zh: 能親將軍者，太后也。

translations.literal: Neng qin jiang jun zhe, tai hou ye.
translations.idiomatic: Able be close general, empress dowager.

sentences.zh: 今將軍傅太子，太子廢而不能爭；

translations.literal: Jin jiang jun fu tai zi, tai zi fei er bu neng zheng;
translations.idiomatic: Now general tutors crown prince, crown prince deposed yet cannot contend;

sentences.zh: 爭不能得，又弗能死。

translations.literal: Zheng bu neng de, you fu neng si.
translations.idiomatic: Contend cannot obtain, moreover cannot die.

sentences.zh: 自引謝病，擁趙女，屏閒處而不朝。

translations.literal: Zi yin xie bing, yong Zhao nu, ping xian chu er bu chao.
translations.idiomatic: Self withdrew apologized illness, embraced Zhao woman, secluded idle place not attend court.

sentences.zh: 相提而論，是自明揚主上之過。

translations.literal: Xiang ti er lun, shi zi ming yang zhu shang zhi guo.
translations.idiomatic: Comparatively discussing, this is self clearly exposing master's errors.

sentences.zh: 有如兩宮螫將軍，則妻子毋類矣。」

translations.literal: You ru liang gong zhe jiang jun, ze qi zi wu lei.
translations.idiomatic: If like two palaces sting general, then wife children no kind.

sentences.zh: 魏其侯然之，乃遂起，朝請如故。

translations.literal: Wei qi hou ran zhi, nai sui qi, chao qing ru gu.
translations.idiomatic: Weiqi marquis agreed to it, then arose, court audience like before.

sentences.zh: 桃侯免相，竇太后數言魏其侯。

translations.literal: Tao hou mian xiang, Dou tai hou shu yan Wei qi hou.
translations.idiomatic: Tao marquis dismissed chancellor, Empress Dou repeatedly spoke Weiqi marquis.

sentences.zh: 孝景帝曰：「太后豈以為臣有愛，不相魏其？

translations.literal: Xiao Jing Di yue: "Tai hou qi yi wei chen you ai, bu xiang Wei qi?
translations.idiomatic: Emperor Jing said: "Empress dowager how consider subject have favoritism, not make chancellor Weiqi?

sentences.zh: 魏其者，沾沾自喜耳，多易。

translations.literal: Wei qi zhe, zhan zhan zi xi er, duo yi.
translations.idiomatic: Weiqi is self-pleased, many easy changes.

sentences.zh: 難以為相，持重。」

translations.literal: Nan yi wei xiang, chi zhong."
translations.idiomatic: Difficult to make chancellor, maintain weight."

sentences.zh: 遂不用，用建陵侯衛綰為丞相。

translations.literal: Sui bu yong, yong Jian ling hou Wei Wan wei cheng xiang.
translations.idiomatic: Then not used, used Jianling marquis Wei Wan as chancellor.

sentences.zh: 武安侯田蚡者，孝景后同母弟也，生長陵。

translations.literal: Wu an hou Tian Fen person, Xiao Jing hou tong mu di ye, sheng Chang ling.
translations.idiomatic: Wuan marquis Tian Fen was Emperor Jing empress's same mother younger brother, born Changling.

sentences.zh: 魏其已為大將軍後，方盛，蚡為諸郎，未貴，往來侍酒魏其，跪起如子姓。

translations.literal: Wei qi yi wei da jiang jun hou, fang sheng, Fen wei zhu lang, wei gui, wang lai shi jiu Wei qi, gui qi ru zi xing.
translations.idiomatic: Weiqi already as grand general after, just flourishing, Fen served as various attendants, not noble, came went served wine Weiqi, kneeled rose like son nephew.

sentences.zh: 及孝景晚節，蚡益貴幸，為太中大夫。

translations.literal: Ji Xiao Jing wan jie, Fen yi gui xing, wei tai zhong da fu.
translations.idiomatic: When Emperor Jing late period, Fen increasingly noble favored, served as palace grand master.

sentences.zh: 蚡辯有口，學槃盂諸書，王太后賢之。

translations.literal: Fen bian you kou, xue Pan yu zhu shu, Wang tai hou xian zhi.
translations.idiomatic: Fen eloquent had mouth, studied Pan Yu various books, Empress Wang considered worthy.

sentences.zh: 孝景崩，即日太子立，稱制，所鎮撫多有田蚡賓客計筴，蚡弟田勝，皆以太后弟，孝景後三年封蚡為武安侯，勝為周陽侯。

translations.literal: Xiao Jing beng, ji ri tai zi li, cheng zhi, suo zhen fu duo you Tian Fen bin ke ji mou, Fen di Tian Sheng, jie yi tai hou di, Xiao Jing hou san nian feng Fen wei Wu an hou, Sheng wei Zhou yang hou.
translations.idiomatic: Emperor Jing passed, same day crown prince established, exercised authority, what pacified comforted much had Tian Fen guests plans, Fen younger brother Tian Sheng, all as empress dowager younger brothers, Emperor Jing empress third year enfeoffed Fen as Wuan marquis, Sheng as Zhouyang marquis.

sentences.zh: 武安侯新欲用事為相，卑下賓客，進名士家居者貴之，欲以傾魏其諸將相。

translations.literal: Wu an hou xin yu yong shi wei xiang, bei xia bin ke, jin ming shi ju yu zhe gui zhi, yu yi qing Wei qi zhu jiang xiang.
translations.idiomatic: Wuan marquis newly wanted to handle affairs as chancellor, humble lowered guests, advanced worthy scholars home residing ennobled them, wanted to incline Weiqi various generals chancellors.

sentences.zh: 建元元年，丞相綰病免，上議置丞相、太尉。

translations.literal: Jian yuan yi nian, cheng xiang Wan bing mian, shang yi zhi cheng xiang, tai wei.
translations.idiomatic: Jian yuan first year, chancellor Wan ill dismissed, emperor discussed establish chancellor, commander.

sentences.zh: 籍福說武安侯曰：「魏其貴久矣，天下士素歸之。

translations.literal: Ji Fu shuo Wu an hou yue: "Wei qi gui jiu, tian xia shi su gui zhi.
translations.idiomatic: Ji Fu spoke Wuan marquis: "Weiqi noble long, realm scholars habitually attach to him.

sentences.zh: 今將軍初興，未如魏其，即上以將軍為丞相，必讓魏其。

translations.literal: Jin jiang jun chu xing, wei ru Wei qi, ji shang yi jiang jun wei cheng xiang, bi rang Wei qi.
translations.idiomatic: Now general initially rises, not know Weiqi, if emperor with general as chancellor, must yield Weiqi.

sentences.zh: 魏其為丞相，將軍必為太尉。

translations.literal: Wei qi wei cheng xiang, jiang jun bi wei tai wei.
translations.idiomatic: Weiqi as chancellor, general must be commander.

sentences.zh: 太尉、丞相尊等耳，又有讓賢名。」

translations.literal: Tai wei, cheng xiang zun deng er, you rang xian ming."
translations.idiomatic: Commander, chancellor honor equal, moreover have yielding worthy name."

sentences.zh: 武安侯乃微言太后風上，於是乃以魏其侯為丞相，武安侯為太尉。

translations.literal: Wu an hou nai wei yan tai hou feng shang, yu shi nai yi Wei qi hou wei cheng xiang, Wu an hou wei tai wei.
translations.idiomatic: Wuan marquis then secretly spoke empress dowager hinted emperor, thereupon with Weiqi marquis as chancellor, Wuan marquis as commander.

sentences.zh: 籍福賀魏其侯，因弔曰：「君侯資性喜善疾惡，方今善人譽君侯，故至丞相；

translations.literal: Ji Fu he Wei qi hou, yin diao yue: "Jun hou zi xing xi shan ji e, fang jin shan ren yu jun hou, gu zhi cheng xiang;
translations.idiomatic: Ji Fu congratulated Weiqi marquis, moreover mourned: "Marquis nature likes good hates evil, currently good people praise marquis, therefore reached chancellor;

sentences.zh: 然君侯且疾惡，惡人眾，亦且毀君侯。

translations.literal: Ran jun hou qie ji e, e ren zhong, yi qie hui jun hou.
translations.idiomatic: But marquis moreover hates evil, evil people many, moreover will slander marquis.

sentences.zh: 君侯能兼容，則幸久；

translations.literal: Jun hou neng jian rong, ze xing jiu;
translations.idiomatic: Marquis able to broadly tolerate, then fortunate long;

sentences.zh: 不能，今以毀去矣。」

translations.literal: Bu neng, jin yi hui qu."
translations.idiomatic: Cannot, now with slander depart."

sentences.zh: 魏其不聽。

translations.literal: Wei qi bu ting.
translations.idiomatic: Weiqi not listened.

sentences.zh: 魏其、武安俱好儒術，推轂趙綰為御史大夫，王臧為郎中令。

translations.literal: Wei qi, Wu an ju hao ru shu, tui gu Zhao Wan wei yu shi da fu, Wang Cang wei lang zhong ling.
translations.idiomatic: Weiqi, Wuan both liked Confucian arts, recommended Zhao Wan as imperial censor, Wang Cang as palace secretary.

sentences.zh: 迎魯申公，欲設明堂，令列侯就國，除關，以禮為服制，以興太平。

translations.literal: Ying Lu Shen gong, yu she ming tang, ling lie hou jiu guo, chu guan, yi li wei fu zhi, yi xing tai ping.
translations.idiomatic: Welcomed Lu Shen gong, wanted to establish bright hall, ordered marquises go to fiefs, remove passes, with ritual make mourning regulations, to raise great peace.

sentences.zh: 舉適諸竇宗室毋節行者，除其屬籍。

translations.literal: Ju shi zhu Dou zong shi wu jie xing zhe, chu qi shu ji.
translations.idiomatic: Raised dismissed various Dou imperial clan none principled conduct, removed their clan registers.

sentences.zh: 時諸外家為列侯，列侯多尚公主，皆不欲就國，以故毀日至竇太后。

translations.literal: Shi zhu wai jia wei lie hou, lie hou duo shang gong zhu, jie bu yu jiu guo, yi gu hui ri zhi Dou tai hou.
translations.idiomatic: At this time various maternal relatives as marquises, marquises many married princesses, all not want go to fiefs, therefore slanders daily reached Empress Dou.

sentences.zh: 太后好黃老之言，而魏其、武安、趙綰、王臧等務隆推儒術，貶道家言，是以竇太后滋不說魏其等。

translations.literal: Tai hou hao Huang Lao zhi yan, er Wei qi, Wu an, Zhao Wan, Wang Cang deng wu long tui ru shu, bian dao jia yan, shi yi Dou tai hou zi bu yue Wei qi deng.
translations.idiomatic: Empress dowager liked Huang Lao sayings, but Weiqi, Wuan, Zhao Wan, Wang Cang etc. diligently promoted Confucian arts, belittled Daoist sayings, therefore Empress Dou increasingly displeased Weiqi etc.

sentences.zh: 及建元二年，御史大夫趙綰請無奏事東宮。

translations.literal: Ji Jian yuan er nian, yu shi da fu Zhao Wan qing wu zou shi dong gong.
translations.idiomatic: When Jian yuan second year, imperial censor Zhao Wan requested no memorial matters eastern palace.

sentences.zh: 竇太后大怒，乃罷逐趙綰、王臧等，而免丞相、太尉，以柏至侯許昌為丞相，武彊侯莊青翟為御史大夫。

translations.literal: Dou tai hou da nu, nai ba zhu Zhao Wan, Wang Cang deng, er mian cheng xiang, tai wei, yi Bai zhi hou Xu Chang wei cheng xiang, Wu qiang hou Zhuang Qing Di wei yu shi da fu.
translations.idiomatic: Dou empress dowager greatly angered, then dismissed banished Zhao Wan, Wang Cang etc., moreover dismissed chancellor, commander, with Baizhi marquis Xu Chang as chancellor, Wuqiang marquis Zhuang Qingdi as imperial censor.

sentences.zh: 魏其、武安由此以侯家居。

translations.literal: Wei qi, Wu an you yi hou ju yu.
translations.idiomatic: Weiqi, Wuan from this as marquises resided home.

sentences.zh: 武安侯雖不任職，以王太后故，親幸，數言事多效，天下吏士趨勢利者，皆去魏其歸武安，武安日益橫。

translations.literal: Wu an hou sui bu ren zhi, yi Wang tai hou gu, qin xing, shu yan shi duo xiao, tian xia li shi qu shi li zhe, jie qu Wei qi gui Wu an, Wu an yi ri heng.
translations.idiomatic: Wuan marquis though not held office, because Wang empress dowager reason, personally favored, repeatedly spoke matters much effective, realm officials scholars pursuing power profit, all left Weiqi attached Wuan, Wuan increasingly arrogant.

sentences.zh: 建元六年，竇太后崩，丞相昌、御史大夫青翟坐喪事不辦，免。

translations.literal: Jian yuan liu nian, Dou tai hou beng, cheng xiang Chang, yu shi da fu Qing Di zuo sang shi bu ban, mian.
translations.idiomatic: Jian yuan sixth year, Dou empress dowager passed, chancellor Chang, imperial censor Qingdi sat mourning matters not managed, dismissed.

sentences.zh: 以武安侯蚡為丞相，以大司農韓安國為御史大夫。

translations.literal: Yi Wu an hou Fen wei cheng xiang, yi da si nong Han An guo wei yu shi da fu.
translations.idiomatic: With Wuan marquis Fen as chancellor, with grand agriculturalist Han Anguo as imperial censor.

sentences.zh: 天下士郡諸侯愈益附武安。

translations.literal: Tian xia shi jun zhu hou yu yi fu Wu an.
translations.idiomatic: Realm scholars commandery feudal lords increasingly attached Wuan.

sentences.zh: 武安者，貌侵，生貴甚。

translations.literal: Wu an zhe, mao qin, sheng gui shen.
translations.idiomatic: Wuan was ugly appearance, born noble very.

sentences.zh: 又以為諸侯王多長，上初即位，富於春秋，蚡以肺腑為京師相，非痛折節以禮詘之，天下不肅。

translations.literal: You yi wei zhu hou wang duo chang, shang chu ji wei, fu yu chun qiu, Fen yi fei fu wei jing shi xiang, fei tong zhe jie yi li qu zhi, tian xia bu su.
translations.idiomatic: Moreover considered feudal lords many tall, emperor initially ascended, rich in youth, Fen as lung liver served capital chancellor, not painfully bend joints with ritual make submit, realm not solemn.

sentences.zh: 當是時，丞相入奏事，坐語移日，所言皆聽。

translations.literal: Dang shi shi, cheng xiang ru zou shi, zuo yu yi ri, suo yan jie ting.
translations.idiomatic: At this time, chancellor entered memorial matters, sat spoke moved days, what said all listened.

sentences.zh: 薦人或起家至二千石，權移主上。

translations.literal: Jian ren huo qi jia zhi er qian shi, quan yi zhu shang.
translations.idiomatic: Recommended people or rose from home to two thousand stone, power shifted master.

sentences.zh: 上乃曰：「君除吏已盡未？

translations.literal: Shang nai yue: "Jun chu li yi jin wei?
translations.idiomatic: Emperor then said: "You dismissed officials already exhausted not?

sentences.zh: 吾亦欲除吏。」

translations.literal: Wu yi yu chu li."
translations.idiomatic: I also want to dismiss officials."

sentences.zh: 嘗請考工地益宅，上怒曰：「君何不遂取武庫！」

translations.literal: Chang qing kao gong di yi zhai, shang nu yue: "Jun he bu sui qu wu ku!"
translations.idiomatic: Once requested examine work place increase residence, emperor angered: "You why not just take armory!"

sentences.zh: 是後乃退。

translations.literal: Shi hou nai tui.
translations.idiomatic: From this then retreated.

sentences.zh: 嘗召客飲，坐其兄蓋侯南鄉，自坐東鄉，以為漢相尊，不可以兄故私橈。

translations.literal: Chang zhao ke yin, zuo qi xiong Gai hou nan xiang, zi zuo dong xiang, yi wei Han xiang zun, bu ke yi xiong gu si nao.
translations.idiomatic: Once summoned guests drink, seated his elder brother Gai marquis south facing, self sat east facing, considered Han chancellor honored, not able because elder brother reason privately bend.

sentences.zh: 武安由此滋驕，治宅甲諸第。

translations.literal: Wu an you ci zi jiao, zhi zhai jia zhu di.
translations.idiomatic: Wuan from this increasingly arrogant, built residence top various mansions.

translations.idiomatic: Emperor from Weiqi time not considered Wuan straight, especially for empress dowager reason.

sentences.zh: 及聞淮南王金事，上曰：「使武安侯在者，族矣。」

translations.literal: Ji wen Huai nan wang jin shi, shang yue: "Shi Wu an hou zai zhe, zu yi."
translations.idiomatic: When heard Huainan king gold matter, emperor said: "If Wuan marquis here, clan exterminated."

sentences.zh: 太史公曰：魏其、武安皆以外戚重，灌夫用一時決筴而名顯。

translations.literal: Tai shi gong yue: Wei qi, Wu an jie yi wai qi zhong, Guan fu yong yi shi jue mou er ming xian.
translations.idiomatic: Grand Scribe said: Weiqi, Wuan both with maternal relatives heavy, Guan Fu used one time decisive plan and name prominent.

sentences.zh: 魏其之舉以吳楚，武安之貴在日月之際。

translations.literal: Wei qi zhi ju yi Wu Chu, Wu an zhi gui zai ri yue zhi ji.
translations.idiomatic: Weiqi raised with Wu Chu, Wuan nobility at sun moon time.

sentences.zh: 然魏其誠不知時變，灌夫無術而不遜，兩人相翼，乃成禍亂。

translations.literal: Ran Wei qi cheng bu zhi shi bian, Guan fu wu shu er bu xun, liang ren xiang yi, nai cheng huo luan.
translations.idiomatic: But Weiqi truly not know time change, Guan Fu no method and not modest, two people mutually helped, then became calamity chaos.

sentences.zh: 武安負貴而好權，杯酒責望，陷彼兩賢。

translations.literal: Wu an fu gui er hao quan, bei jiu ze wang, xian bi liang xian.
translations.idiomatic: Wuan bore nobility but loved power, goblet wine blamed disappointed, trapped those two worthy.

sentences.zh: 嗚呼哀哉！

translations.literal: Wu hu ai zai!
translations.idiomatic: Alas alas!

sentences.zh: 遷怒及人，命亦不延。

translations.literal: Qian nu ji ren, ming yi bu yan.
translations.idiomatic: Transferred anger reached people, fate also not prolonged.

sentences.zh: 眾庶不載，竟被惡言。

translations.literal: Zhong shu bu zai, jing bei e yan.
translations.idiomatic: Multitude people not carry, finally received evil words.

sentences.zh: 嗚呼哀哉！

translations.literal: Wu hu ai zai!
translations.idiomatic: Alas alas!

sentences.zh: 禍所從來矣！

translations.literal: Huo suo cong lai yi!
translations.idiomatic: Calamity what from came!
